name: Black Shadows
description:
Welcome to Black Shadows where you have a plethora of puzzles to solve and a lot of fun to uncover. This game is sure to keep you occupied for many, many hours. This creepy black and white game is full of unique puzzles, brilliant effects & gameplay.

Features:
- A huge world to explore
- A "Million" puzzles to solve
- Amazing gameplay
- Perfect for the color blind
- SO much more
- NO ADS!
